summaries.description: Milano Rogoredo (15:04) - Firenze S. M. Novella (16:50)

offers.name: BASE
offers.description: This ticket allows unlimited booking changes prior to departure. For Frecce Trains, if the Base price level originally paid is not available, you are required to request a ticket change and pay the resulting price difference. Refund with deduction.

offers.name: Economy
offers.description: Reservation change allowed before departure. Refund not allowed. Limited seats

offers.name: YOUNG
offers.description: This offer is reserved for CartaFreccia holders under 30 years of age (the passenger travelling under this offer must be the CartaFRECCIA cardholder). Changes may only be made to date/time by paying the difference in price compared to the Base price. No refunds. Subject to seat availability.

reportItemMessage.message: For the selected offer it is necessary to enter a Cartafreccia code.

offers.name: SENIOR
offers.description: This offer is reserved for CartaFreccia holders aged 60 or over (the passenger travelling under this offer must be the CartaFRECCIA cardholder). Changes may only be made to date/time by paying the difference in price compared to the Base price. No refunds. Subject to seat availability.
